title: W/T/B! Need seven red man tobacco cards indian chiefs. T129 1952
author: SPARK929

posts.post_title: W/T/B! Need seven red man tobacco cards indian chiefs. T129 1952
posts.post_content:
Picked up an almost complete set of REDMAN TOBACCO CARDS INDIAN CHIEFS T129 1952. Need following cards to complete the set.  :(
Willing to buy reasonable and decent condition following: #4, 5, 6, 7, 15, 26, and an upgrade on #40.
A little help out there would be appreciated. I know there are lots of tobacco collectors and surely they have duplicates they would like to dispose of the ones I could use. Surely they are out there!!!!!!
THANKS,
JOE
